title: [NFS C] Need For Speed: Carbon (2006) [Full-RiP] [AVeRAnTeD]
description:
[NFSC] Need For Speed: Carbon (2006) (Music + Audio + Video) [Full-RiP] [AVeRAnTeD]
-------------------------------------------------------------------------
Need For Speed Carbon [Full-RiP]
!! Ripped By AVeRAnTeD !!

---===*** Ripped ***===---
>> Removed : Only some videos(trailer) of NBA07, Madden07 and NHL07 which had nothing to do with this game.
NO video from career is removed.
>> Videos : encoded to lower bitrate (vp6 @ 2000+ kbps)
>> Music : encoded to lower bitrate (OGG Vorbis @ 36000Hz, 64-96 kbps)
>> Sounds : encoded to lower bitrate (AAC_HE 2pass @ 64 kbps with NeroAAC)

Packed Size: 1.39 GB || Unpacked Size: 4.22 GB
-------------------------------------------------------------------------

---===*** Instructions ***===---
1. Extract the archive with 7-Zip or equivalent
2. Open the Extracted folder and run Setup.bat
3. Wait for installation to complete (15 min Approx).
Close your antivirus or the setup will take more than 40 min.
3. Run the game from Desktop or from NFSC.exe

This is full game with all Music,Audio,Speech and Videos
-------------------------------------------------------------------------

---===*** IF the game does not start ***===---
1. Right click NFSC.exe and open properties, then goto Compatibility 
Tab and check the "Run this program in compatibility mode for" box 
and then select "Windows XP (Service Pack 3)" as compatibility mode. 
You can try other modes also. 
2. Update your Graphic Drivers. 

NOTE: I have only tested this game in Windows 7 Ultimate (64-bit) and I
remember that I was not able to run this game(Original copy) when I had
Windows XP installed in my PC. (Maybe because my drivers were not
up to date). So I doubt whether it will work for Windows XP users or not.

If you have any problem with setup give as much details as you can about the problem.
